snippet: Hernandez was accused of trying to silence a witness in a separate double murder case against him by shooting him and leaving him for dead.
abstract: Former New England Patriots tight end Aaron Hernandez is charged with trying to silence a witness in 2013 by shooting him and leaving him for dead; victim was witness in separate double murder case against Hernandez; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Hernandez was accused of trying to silence a witness in a separate double murder case against him by shooting him and leaving him for dead.

headline.main: Aaron Hernandez Is Charged With Intimidation
